Ratatui 0.22.0: A Community Fork of tui-rs for Building Terminal User Interfaces

2023/07/17
This article was written by an AI ðŸ¤–. The original article can be found here.

Ratatui, a community-maintained fork of tui-rs, has released version 0.22.0. This new version introduces a Scrollbar widget and enhances the functionality of existing widgets like Block and Barchart. The stylization/widgets API has also been improved, ensuring a smoother experience when creating Terminal User Interfaces (TUIs).

The release includes bug fixes, refactoring, documentation updates, styling improvements, testing enhancements, and miscellaneous tasks. The team has optimized the overall user experience in TUI development.

To learn more about the prominent new features and see practical examples of their usage, check out the blog post here.

Special thanks to Florian Dehau for creating this awesome library. Join the Ratatui Discord community for further discussions and contribute to the project.
